title: MinIO Object Storage Dashboard
description: Production monitoring for MinIO: cluster health, storage, S3 requests, drives, replication, and resources.

panels.title: Nodes Online
panels.description: Total MinIO nodes online in cluster.

panels.title: Total Buckets
panels.description: Total number of buckets in cluster.

panels.title: Healing Drives
panels.description: Drives currently being healed. Non-zero = recovery in progress.

panels.title: Read Locks
panels.description: Current read locks on this peer.

panels.title: Write Locks
panels.description: Current write locks on this peer.
